Lists\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you are about to start a new project and you are unsure about what you are concerned you may forget to do something important, we have a few resources here to help you.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMDMO/Sprint+0+-+Checklist\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Sprint 0 Check List\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" aims to help you transition from PreSales to Delivery. While not every line item is applicable to all projects, review this checklist before your project starts to make sure you are on the right track.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you are about to start your project Kick Off, review this \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMDMO/Project+Kick+Off\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Project Kick Off\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" page for helpful tips, including a Start Checklist, Tips for managing multiple streams, Resource Plan Best Practice, and RACI examples.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"These checklists help YOU be ready to start the project, however, you should also check if your CLIENT is ready. Often clients don’t realize what they are asking for and are not prepared for the projects even if we are. Here’s a short checklist to help you understand your client’s readiness.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Sit with the client to get a sense of their internal preparations for the project.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Gauge if the client is aware of what is to come with the project.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Do they understand what it will take to staff and onboard the team?\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Have they made themselves available for necessary future discussions?\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Have they made other related parties aware of the project?\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Prime the customers’ expectations.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Discuss engagement model and how it will work. Capture the client’s organizational structure.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Capture stakeholder names and contacts.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Discuss where the project fits in the client’s organizational structure and how you should address any concerns and with whom.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If the client is not internally prepared and/or is unable to discuss details of the engagement structure, then you may be in for a rocky start. If this is the case, then begin documenting dependencies and risks immediately and present them to the appropriate stakeholders as soon as possible. You cannot force the client to be ready, but you can politely inform them about how they may impact the project.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Starting Off When You are NOT Technical\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Not everyone at EPAM has a background in software development. If you are the first line of contact for a new project, but you don’t know what will be needed to deliver the technical solution, then your starting point should be to find someone to advise you.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ask your superior if they know a good Solution Architect who can meet with you to help answer your questions.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Email the Global Solution Architecture Team for help with your project: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:SpecialEPM-GSATTeam@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"SpecialEPM-GSATTeam@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you need more specific expertise, then check out our page on \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/GDOKB/How+to+Find+the+Right+People\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"How to Find the Right People\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Assets and Templates\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Let us not re-invent the wheel every project. There are standard project documents that can be expected for every project. Just be sure to abide by the sharing restrictions.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://onboarding.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Onboarding.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Onboarding phase consists of the necessary steps to go from being assigned to a project to actually working on the project. It includes receiving background information about the project, the client, and the technologies, getting acquainted with the team members and the managers, and receiving access to all the spaces (either physical or digital) where you will perform your work.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you are setting up the onboarding flow for your account, consider preparing an onboarding module. On \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/#/dashboard\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Onboarding.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", an onboarding module is a specific program that new team members go through when they are assigned to your project. You can build a customized onboarding module specific to your project! This is particularly good for long standing accounts. See this page for \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMADPTFAQ/How+to+request+a+new+Module\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"How to Request a New Module\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
